020import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.paste.IPasteable;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.paste.IPasteClient;
022import org.json.JSONObject;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.io.OutputStream;
026import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
027import java.net.URL;
028import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
029import java.util.Arrays;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.Scanner;
032
033/**
034 * MCLogsClient
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 1.0.0.2
038 */
039public class MclogsClient implements IPasteClient {
040  private static final String MCLOGS_API_URL = "https://api.mclo.gs/1/log";
041
042  @Override
043  public String identifier() {
044    return "mclo.gs";
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  public String endpoint() {
049    return MCLOGS_API_URL;
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public String apiKey() {
054    return "N/A"; // mclo.gs does not require an API key
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public Optional<String> createSingle(final IPasteable pasteable) {
059    return createPaste(pasteable);
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public Optional<String> createMultiple(final IPasteable... pasteables) {
064    return Arrays.stream(pasteables)
065            .map(this::createPaste)
066            .filter(Optional::isPresent)
067            .map(Optional::get)
068            .reduce((first, second) -> second); // Return the last created paste's URL
069  }
070
071  private Optional<String> createPaste(final IPasteable pasteable) {
072    try {
073
074      final JSONObject requestBody = new JSONObject();
075      requestBody.put("content", pasteable.content());
076
077      final HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) new URL(MCLOGS_API_URL).openConnection();
078      connection.setRequestMethod("POST");
079      connection.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/json");
080      connection.setDoOutput(true);
081
082      try(final OutputStream os = connection.getOutputStream()) {
083
084        os.write(requestBody.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
085      }
086
087      try(final Scanner scanner = new Scanner(connection.getInputStream(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
088
089        final String response = scanner.useDelimiter("\\A").next();
090        final JSONObject jsonResponse = new JSONObject(response);
091
092        return Optional.of(jsonResponse.getString("url"));
093      }
094    } catch(final IOException e) {
095
096      e.printStackTrace();
097      return Optional.empty();
098    }
099  }
100}
